description: This table lists the Care Plan Problems associated with each treatment plan.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IP_CP_PRB_TRTDAY_ID
columns.description: The treatment day record the care plan problem was added from.

columns.name: IP_CP_PRB_USR_ID
columns.description: The user that added the care plan problem from Pathway.

columns.name: IP_CP_PRB_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the care plan problem was added from Pathway.
